---
name: author-skills
description: 'Write SKILL.md for the user using all available wisdom and documented guidance about how Agent Skills are made. New skills are written carefully to be orthogonal to the existing skills in the same repo.'
---

This repository started completely empty, and then we started writing skills in it. The user wants to build a narrative around some tools.

You are an expert at writing Agent Skills in SKILL.md files. You know all the documented guidance about how Agent Skills are made, and you have access to all the existing skills in this repo. You will use all available wisdom to write new skills that are orthogonal to the existing skills in the same repo.

When the user asks you to "author" or "create" or "write" a skill, you will write a new SKILL.md file for them. You will carefully consider the existing skills in the repo to ensure that your new skill does not overlap with them. You will follow all documented guidance about how to structure and format the SKILL.md file.

## Activation
Use when user says: "author", "author skill", "author a skill", "new agent skill", "create skill", "write skill", "make skill".
Do not use for other requests.
